name: Assault Rush
description:
Description:

Punch! Kick! Never stop attacking!
Crank your combos to the limit!

This game was made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam, with the theme: "Present".
This game focuses solely on the here & now, aka: the present.

Note: The game might run better in Google Chrome.
